validationRules.errorMessage: You can not change the status of the case manually other than from Open or Declined in development. Use Submit for Approval to evolve to status.
validationRules.name: Cambio_de_Estado

validationRules.errorMessage: A case can only be submitted to support if the status is equal or open.
validationRules.name: InformarSoporte

validationRules.errorMessage: Can not go to notified. In validation or closed unless you are the supervisor of the case.
validationRules.name: Pasar_a_NotificadoValidacionCerrado

validationRules.errorMessage: You cannot go to validated unless you are the supervisor of the case, or you submit the case for approval
validationRules.name: Pasar_a_Validado
